interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: S-noilite Secret Wire in Human Hair Extensions 100% Real Remy Hair Extension Invisible String 16" 90g One Piece Double Drawn Fish Line Extensions for Women Gifts #60 Platinum Blonde
Review Date: 2020/11/18
Store: S-noilite
Average Rating: 2.0
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '12.4 x 7.56 x 0.59 inches; 4.23 Ounces'}
Review Text: So they came packed nicely but not in the s-noilite package. No logo. Just staples to a cardboard slip and wrapped in a pink bag. The hair feels nice. However, I bought the same one twice. First one was brassy in color. I was ordering the #60 in platinum. The thick version. Alot of hair. But totally brassy. So I saw the price drop so I was like okay I'll try again see if they get the color right. Nope. Still brassy and the second one was not the thick halo version. No more then 50grams. Both have double thick wires which don't hide well compared to other companies. The thin version they sent on the second ordee  had clips as well. Why doesn't the thick version have clips? It would help so the ends stay close to the head. The wire was also short. So not happy based on color, difference in style sent even though I ordered same style twiced, and not package from s-noilite. My seller was us fashion outlet. I'd be sceptical to purchase from them if they are the only seller.
Review Title: Bought twice and neither was right color nor brand
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Clip in Hair Extensions - Platinum Blonde - Straight - 18in / 46cm - Full Head - 8 Pcs 120g - Japanese Heat Resistant Synthetic Hairpiece - Looks and Feels like Real Hair Elegant Hair {'Brand': 'Elegant Hair', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '18 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '18 x 38.98 x 0.39 inches; 4.23 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SCIHLST20920', 'UPC': '799632432838'} fantastic value for fake hair. perfect color. True pale blonde platinum with white like highlights. Great if you bleach your hair!
Very soft. doesnt tangle. blends into your own hair very well. Easy to put on and off. Keep the bag and put them in it when not in use.
Make sure you straighten your own hair first before you put these in because these are SUPER straight! fantastic value for fake hair Elegant Hair - 17" PONYTAIL Clip in Hair Piece CURLY Platinum Blonde #16/60 REVERSIBLE Claw Clip 220g Elegant Hair {'Brand': 'Elegant Hair', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '17 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '16.93 x 3.94 x 1.97 inches; 5.64 Ounces', 'UPC': '799632434306'} Fantastic! I own the 22inch hair version as well. Both are great but the 22inch one can weight heavy on the head after 6 to 8 hours (and i suffer from migraines so I have to be careful about that) . this 17inch one is lighter but still VERY full. can wear it all day at work with no issues.
Very curly! very beautiful! Looks real! This is elegant HAIR! CAISHA by PRETTYSHOP Hair Donut Up Do Hair Ring Hairstyler Bun Maker Bridal Hairpiece Hair Styling Tool Brown DK2 CAISHA ['Synthetic fiber hair styler. Diameter: 3,6" (9cm); Weight: 0.1 lb (45g). . . .'] {'Color': 'brown #DK2', 'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Brand': 'CAISHA', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '9.45 x 7.09 x 1.97 inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '9.45 x 7.09 x 1.97 inches; 1.41 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'DKxx', 'UPC': '885860274224 716670803819', 'Manufacturer': 'Generic'} More golden in color and it losses shape after a few wears Its okay. More gold then photo Magnetic Eyelashes False Lashes with Magnets Top and Bottom Magnetic Lashes Resuable Lashes 2 Pair / 8pcs Natural Style Cuckoo {'Brand': 'Cuckoo', 'Material': 'synthetic fibers', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '5.12 x 4.3 x 0.9 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Product Dimensions': '5.12 x 4.3 x 0.9 inches; 2.4 Ounces'} The magnet is strong. I bought the two paid sandwich style. I tried the videos, and the hacks that say cut them ...I tried applying with special lash tweezers... Nothing works to get them close to the lash lid. The magnetic is strong so I'm sure it won't fall off, but it's so strong that when you start to move the under lash toward your eye with the upper lash laying on top of your lashes, the magnetic pulls and moves is soil quickly that it always ends up locked half way through your natural lashes. And I'm a contact wearer...so it's not like I have fear of putting stuff near my eyes. These probably will work well with lash liners. The lashes themselves look nicely constructed. It's just the application as intended is impossible. The lashes look beautiful but you'll never get them on ENTRANCED STYLES Straight Black Wig with Bangs for Women Fashion Long Straight Wig Heat Resistant Bangs Synthetic Wig 20 Inch Natural Looking Daily Party Cosplay Wig ENTRANCED STYLES {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'ENTRANCED STYLES', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '10.4 x 6.1 x 2 inches; 3.99 Ounces', 'UPC': '778992677189'} There are better options out there. This had a weird part. The flesh color looks like layers of beige mesh for the scalp and it kind of shimmers like pantyhose? Super straight part so to fix your need alot of plucking but with that trange scalp material, I don't think it's worth it for me. The scalp pokes out at the edges because there is not enough hair on top. Wefts are shown. Bangs are thin and would need alot of styling to look good. Not that great. Underwhelmed. The thick version. Alot of hair. But totally brassy. So I saw the price drop so I was like okay I'll try again see if they get the color right. Nope. Still brassy and the second one was not the thick halo version. No more then 50grams. Both have double thick wires which don't hide well compared to other companies. The thin version they sent on the second ordee had clips as well. Why doesn't the thick version have clips? It would help so the ends stay close to the head. The wire was also short. profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Care Preferences**: The user shows a strong interest in high-quality hair extensions, particularly synthetic and real hair options. Their recent experiences with synthetic products have led to heightened scrutiny regarding quality, appearance, and fit, underscoring a discerning approach.

- **Color and Aesthetic**: The user continues to explore color diversity, favoring platinum blonde shades, but has encountered issues with achieving the correct color in recent purchases. They've started incorporating golden brown tones into their look as part of their evolving aesthetic.

- **Product Characteristics**: There is an increased emphasis on quality and compatibility with natural hair after frustration with previous purchases that did not meet expectations. Complaints about color accuracy and product variations reflect a desire for more reliable options in extensions.

- **Value for Money**: The user values great quality and consistency, as demonstrated by disappointment with products that failed to deliver on promised features, affecting their willingness to buy from certain sellers.

- **Care Instructions**: The user seeks effective care tips that enhance product longevity and maintenance, aligning with their focus on quality.

- **Makeup Preferences**: Although interested in makeup, they continue to seek user-friendly options, particularly for application techniques such as false eyelashes, emphasizing ease of use.

Overall, the user prefers functional, high-quality hair and makeup products that are easy to use, reliable, and provide good value, while remaining open to exploring new styles and colors.
